title: ‘Our Protests Will Continue’: Pro-Palestinian Activists Plan More Aussie Rallies Despite Israel-Hamas Deal
description: MELBOURNE, AUSTRALIA - NOVEMBER 23: Protesters gather at Flinders Street Station on November 23, 2023 in Melbourne, Australia. Organised by School Students For Palestine, the call for action on the group's social media feeds prompted a statement from federal Education Minister Jason Clare that children should be in class during school hours. The ongoing Israel-Hamas conflict continues to cause social tensions in societies around the world, including in Australian cities. (Photo by Asanka Ratnayake/Getty Images)
